TCA Members - Example Roles: Quartile 1 band include, on average, a median entry-level business development, a median entry-level security analyst, a median entry-level product designer, or a median entry-level sales engineer.

Low-mid quartile roles include, on average, a median entry-level product manager, a 75th percentile entry-level software engineer, a 25th percentile senior security analyst, or a median entry-level sales engineer.

Mid-upper quartile roles include, on average, a median senior data science manager, a 90th percentile entry-level product manager, a median senior technical program manager, or a 25th percentile senior sales engineer.

This top-paying quartile would contain high-level leadership roles including C-Suite and Vice President-level executives as well as top-tier technical roles like a 75th percentile senior ux researcher, a 75th percentile senior data science manager.
